Flowise AI Complete Guide 2026

Build Custom LLM Apps and AI Agents with Drag-and-Drop Simplicity

What is Flowise AI?

Flowise AI is an open-source drag-and-drop tool for building customized LLM (Large Language Model) applications and AI agents. It provides a visual interface that makes it easy to create complex AI workflows without writing code, while still offering the flexibility to add custom code when needed.

Key Features

  • Visual Canvas: Drag-and-drop interface for building AI workflows
  • No-Code/Low-Code: Build without coding, extend with custom code
  • Template Library: Pre-built templates for common use cases
  • Multi-Model Support: Works with GPT-4, Claude, Llama, and more
  • Vector Database Integration: Built-in support for Pinecone, Weaviate, and others
  • API Endpoints: Deploy your flows as REST APIs
  • Self-Hosted: Run on your own infrastructure

How Flowise AI Works

Flowise AI uses a node-based interface where you can connect different components to create AI workflows:

  1. LLM Nodes: Connect to language models like GPT-4 or Claude
  2. Prompt Nodes: Define instructions and templates
  3. Memory Nodes: Add conversation history and context
  4. Tool Nodes: Integrate APIs and external services
  5. Agent Nodes: Create autonomous AI agents
  6. Output Nodes: Format and deliver results

Popular Use Cases

  • Chatbots: Build intelligent conversational assistants
  • Document QA: Create question-answering systems for your documents
  • Content Generation: Automate blog posts, social media, and marketing copy
  • Data Analysis: Process and analyze data with AI
  • Workflow Automation: Connect AI agents with business processes

Pricing

Free: Open-source, self-hosted

Cloud Version: Starts at $29/month (hosted solution)

Note: You'll still pay API costs for LLM usage
